remarks: Version of ~ sbco2d with a distinct variable constraint between ` x ` and ` z ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Feb-2018.)
statement:
sbco2vd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
sbco2vd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. z ph ) $.
sbco2vd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. z ps ) ) $.
sbco2vd $p |- ( ph -> ( [ y / z ] [ z / x ] ps <-> [ y / x ] ps ) ) $.
$d x z $.
